By the way, i use peer guardian 2, but what are chunks and why do you have to protect a torrent from it.

This happens with a lot of torrents, they're fake users, maybe from companies who are trying to "poison" and monitorize the torrents system... since i installed Peerguardian2, those fake users are off, they can never get in.

Här kan man läsa följande:

The IP range 38.100.x.x is registered to a major US corporation Safenet-Inc who may be acting on behalf of record companies...

adw_uk - 2006-07-13 20:40 GMT:

and taking chunks of torrents, corrupting them then passing them on to downloaders.

adw_uk - 2006-07-13 20:40 GMT:

I have added a filter rule to my router so this IP range gets nothing.

To block 38.100.x.x from taking chunks from you to corrupt and pass on edit your ipfilter.dat file. I use BitComet so it is in a 'rules' folder under the main directory

HELP STOP dumb materials on TPB. Rewrite it better if possible.

New Swedish laws. 


The Swedish Police have permission to sniff/read/listen on network/phone trafik to prevent unnatural porn sutch as Childporn, incest, animal (maby in a wile animal), rape etc etc. 


It is extremly easy to detect locate and read traffik on the net. They just use programs as Optnet, wireshark and sniffer pro. (Read about this) 


I am telling you this to give you a chance to stop this. Shore public shower cam is exating, but prob not leagal. Stop sharing this shit, Swedish police have the right to trace outside sweden aswell! They prob already have MAC, IP and your names, but they cant use non of them becouse of one reason. It was never leagal to listen to the trafic before. 


Once again, remove all dumb material on TPB manly.

Hade ett program som klistrade in subs till tex avi klipp. Vet dock inte vad det heter.
Kolla efter WinAVI Video Converter. Jag andvänder version 7.6

Måste lägga till: Du måste nog ha tex FFdshow eller Vobsub (stavning). Någon av de programen kommer att skpela upp din undertext samtidigt som du konverterar och då "fastnar din text"
Finns en guide..sök på googel.
Dock kan du söka efter AVI Recomp. Om du är medlem på undertexter.se kan du se en guide om just det programet för att adda texter.

Seed please! I really want this movie, ill keep seeding it as I've downloaded it
8 seeds, but an avg 300 kB/s DL!!!  I guess it pays to hunt outside the "NEW RELEASE" aisle!  (Great movie, too.)

Having DL's and viewed, my two cents:  this IS a complete rip of the DVD, up to and including the auto-play previews at startup, the FBI warning, and all three DD 5.1 channels (Eng, Fr, Sp).  The special features are all there--although why anyone cares about "Stills Galleries" is beyond me.  In fact, the Stills Galleries are poorly rendered--blocky as hell, like iPod blown up to 40".  Film playback was good, but visual quality suffered from the overcompression necessary to cram all the other useless (IMO) crap into the DVD's GB limit.  Also, tiny "hiccups" were evident at all chapter changes--possibly again due to the level of compression (but I'm just guessing).
This is probably the best overall rip of the film still active, but I really wish I could trade in some of the annoying (IMO) content for higher visual fidelity in the actual movie.  The stills gallery looks so awful that it should have been cut solely for aesthetic reasons, even if that alone would not allow for better film resolution.  And the FBI warning...  well, I don't have to tell any of you what to think about that.
I'm not trying to be a nitpicky bastard--I appreciate the work that Team MTR did on this and many, many other films.  My personal preferences always favor a leaner edit with as much dedicated to visual quality as is possible.  It's certainly a watchable rendering, and of course if you're a French or Spanish speaker then you'll love the retention of the 5.1 audio for those languages... for me, though, the complete reproduction of all the DVD's content left too little overhead remaining for the film itself.
